data:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.4" admin_label="Section 1: Hero Split Screen" background_color="#0f1419" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false"] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" make_equal="on"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_direction="165deg" background_color_gradient_start="#0f1419" background_color_gradient_end="#253B50" custom_padding="80px|60px|80px|60px|true|true"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600||on|||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="14px" text_letter_spacing="0.15em"]

FOR MANUFACTURING BUSINESS OWNERS

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#ffffff" header_font_size="52px" header_line_height="1.1em" header_letter_spacing="-0.03em"]

Your True Costs Are Invisible.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.75em"]

“Shadow Excel” files have replaced your standard operating procedures. Ghost inventory means system says 100, shelf says 50. We fix this—because we’ve spent 44 years doing nothing but manufacturing software.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_button button_text="See How We Fix It" button_url="/products/" _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="#3798E4" button_border_radius="12px" button_font="Source Sans 3|600|||||||" button_icon="5||divi||400" /] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_padding="48px||||false|false" border_width_top="1px" border_color_top="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"]
44Years Manufacturing Focus
50K+Factories Served
300378Shenzhen Listed
[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_direction="165deg" background_color_gradient_start="#0369a1" background_color_gradient_end="#2d7bc4" custom_padding="80px|60px|80px|60px|true|true"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|600||on|||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.9)" text_font_size="14px" text_letter_spacing="0.15em"]

FOR ERP IMPLEMENTERS

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#ffffff" header_font_size="52px" header_line_height="1.1em" header_letter_spacing="-0.03em"]

Trapped in the Man-Day Model?

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.75em"]

Your revenue is capped by headcount. Customization wars burn out your best consultants. We offer a way out—product-based margins that compound instead of compress.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_button button_text="Escape the Trap" button_url="/partner-program/" _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="rgba(255,255,255,0)" button_border_width="2" button_border_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" button_border_radius="12px" button_font="Source Sans 3|600|||||||" /] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_padding="48px||||false|false" border_width_top="1px" border_color_top="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"]
30-40%License Margin
50%Recurring Revenue
[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section] [et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.4" admin_label="Section 2: Client Logo Bar" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#f8fafc" background_color_gradient_end="#ffffff" background_color_gradient_direction="180deg" custom_padding="60px|40px|60px|40px|true|true"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500||on|||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="12px" text_letter_spacing="0.15em" text_orientation="center"]

TRUSTED BY LEADING MANUFACTURERS IN THAILAND

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_orientation="center" custom_margin="40px||||false|false"]
Client Logo 1 Client Logo 2 Client Logo 3 Client Logo 4 Client Logo 5 Client Logo 6
[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px" custom_padding="32px||||false|false" border_width_top="1px" border_color_top="#e2e8f0"] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_number_counter title="Factories Worldwide" number="50000" _builder_version="4.27.4" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="#64748b" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#253B50" number_font_size="28px" text_orientation="center" /] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_number_counter title="Years in Manufacturing" number="44" _builder_version="4.27.4" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="#64748b" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#253B50" number_font_size="28px" text_orientation="center" /] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_orientation="center"]
CertifiedThai Revenue Department
[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section] [et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.4" admin_label="Section 3: Factory Path Checks" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#f8fafc" background_color_gradient_end="#f1f5f9" background_color_gradient_direction="165deg" custom_padding="100px|40px|100px|40px|true|true"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500||on|||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="0.2em" text_orientation="center"]

FOR MANUFACTURING BUSINESS OWNERS

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#253B50" header_2_font_size="44px" text_orientation="center"]

Do You Recognize These Problems?

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center"]

If any of these sound familiar, you’re not alone. We’ve helped 50,000+ factories escape these exact traps.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#e2e8f0" custom_css_main_element="transition: all 0.4s ease;||:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); box-shadow: 0 12px 32px rgba(55,152,228,0.15); border-color: #3798E4; }"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(55,152,228,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

01

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“Shadow Excel” Reality

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="#475569" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="#3798E4" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“You know your factory isn’t actually running on your current system—it’s running on spreadsheets because your staff finds the software too rigid or slow.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

Your real operations live in unconnected Excel files, not in your ERP. Financial data doesn’t match physical reality because planners work outside the system.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#e2e8f0"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(55,152,228,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

02

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“The Black Box” Problem

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="#475569" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="#3798E4" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“You know exactly how much raw material you bought and how many finished goods you sold, but the 3 weeks in between (WIP) are invisible.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

You rely on paper reports filled out yesterday to understand what happened today. You can’t see what’s happening on the floor right now without walking over and asking.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#e2e8f0"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(55,152,228,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

03

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“Ghost Inventory” Crisis

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="#475569" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="#3798E4" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“The system says you have 100 units, but the shelf has 50. This discrepancy forces your team to hoard ‘safety stock’ just to survive.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

Inventory inaccuracy ties up millions in unnecessary capital and destroys your ability to promise reliable delivery dates. The “borrowing culture” has replaced discipline.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="800px"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#e2e8f0"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(55,152,228,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

04

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“Cost Guesswork” Trap

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="#475569" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="#3798E4" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“You quoted a price last month based on estimated costs. This month the same product costs 15% more to make—and you have no idea why.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

Batch-to-batch cost fluctuations are invisible without production-order-level tracking. You’re pricing based on last quarter’s averages, not this morning’s reality.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="#e2e8f0"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(55,152,228,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

05

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“10-Second Answer” Failure

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="#475569" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="#3798E4" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“When your biggest customer calls and asks ‘where is my order?’—you put them on hold, walk to the shop floor, and hope someone knows.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

Real-time delivery status should be a click away, not a 20-minute investigation. Every hold costs you credibility with the customers who matter most.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_button button_text="See How We Fix This" button_url="/products/" _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="#3798E4" button_border_radius="12px" button_font="Source Sans 3|600|||||||" button_alignment="center" /] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section] [et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.4" admin_label="Section 4: Partner Path Checks" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#0f1419" background_color_gradient_end="#253B50" background_color_gradient_direction="165deg" custom_padding="100px|40px|100px|40px|true|true"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500||on|||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="0.2em" text_orientation="center"]

FOR ERP IMPLEMENTERS

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#ffffff" header_2_font_size="44px" text_orientation="center"]

Do You Recognize These Traps?

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" text_font_size="18px" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center"]

Your consulting business model has structural ceilings. The good news: there’s a way out.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.05)" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

01

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“The Man-Day Trap”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“Your revenue is mathematically capped by your headcount. You cannot grow your top line without proportionally increasing your payroll costs.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

You are selling hours, not assets. Revenue = Hours Worked, making exponential growth impossible. Every January, you start at zero again.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.05)" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

02

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“Customization Death Spiral”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“You accept customization requests to win the deal, but then you become married to that code forever.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

You can’t upgrade clients on custom code. Support becomes a nightmare of unbillable hours. Your profit evaporated the moment you said “Yes” to a non-standard request.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.05)" custom_padding="40px|32px|40px|32px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" border_width_all="1px" border_color_all="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|800|||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.15)" text_font_size="64px"]

03

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#ffffff" header_3_font_size="20px"]

“The Ghost IT Burden”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||on||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" text_font_size="16px" border_width_left="3px" border_color_left="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" custom_padding="||0px|16px|false|false"]

“You aren’t just their ERP consultant—you are their unpaid IT department, fixing Wi-Fi, printers, and user discipline issues.”

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.6em"]

80% of Thai SMEs lack an internal IT Manager. You subsidize their operations with your margins. The “free work” that kills your spirit but you feel forced to do to keep the relationship.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_button button_text="See the Way Out" button_url="/partner-program/" _builder_version="4.27.4" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="rgba(255,255,255,0)" button_border_width="2" button_border_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" button_border_radius="12px" button_font="Source Sans 3|600|||||||" button_alignment="center" /] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section] [et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.4" admin_label="Section 5: Product Pillars" background_color="#F5F7FA" custom_padding="100px|40px|100px|40px|true|true"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.4"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono|500||on|||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="0.2em" text_orientation="center"]

COMPLETE MANUFACTURING STACK

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#253B50" header_2_font_size="44px" text_orientation="center"]

One Ecosystem. Total Visibility.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center"]

From financials to the factory floor, every DigiWin product works together—no integration nightmares, no data silos.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4" _builder_version="4.27.4" max_width="1200px"] [et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.27.4" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="32px|24px|32px|24px|true|true" border_radii="on|20px|20px|20px|20px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="20px" box_shadow_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.06)"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" header_3_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="#253B50" header_3_font_size="20px"]

ERP Core

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="JetBrains Mono||||on||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="11px" text_letter_spacing="0.05em"]

ENTERPRISE RESOURCE PLANNING

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.4" text_font="Lexend|600|||||||" text_text_color="#253B50" text_font_size="15px" text_line_height="1.3em"]

The central brain of your business

Foxconn FII
